summary: A university student finds himself wrapped up in the bizarre world of his next door neighbor, learning about his history and relationship with a girl who changed his life.
cast: Gaku Hamada|Eita|Megumi Seki|Kei Tamura|Kaoru Hirata|Midoriko Kimura|Hidekazu Mashima|Ryûhei Matsuda|Ken'ichi Nagira|Nene Ohtsuka|Akio Seki
title: Ahiru to kamo no koinrokkâ
